Name: C0NT4CT Radio
Description: C0NT4CT Radio A small handheld radio device. General Category Tools Tech Tier Tier 4 Description Contacts a nearby C0NT4CT Device to kick off Operations on the go. Will not work if there is no C0NT4CT device placed on the map. Flavor Text A truly remarkable piece of equipment. Statistics Weight 1 Kg Misc Crafted At Fabricator
